name: USA Truck Driver
description: USA Truck Driver is the most adventurous and most exciting game with powerful engine truck to take cargo and pass them to further point. This is the most realistic truck game. Deliver heavy cargo from one place to another in given time. Be the Trucker like a real truck Driver and drive cargo trucks in the best truck game forever. You will move this heavy truck to its target point with precision and accuracy. Here you can also get a chance to learn and improve your driving skills. The User's task is to transport luggage safely from starting place to final destination. This awesome game has incredible missions, realistic physics and optimized truly detailed graphics for more fun. When you will reached your destination then park your loaded truck carefully without doing any single mistake in truck driving games. Download now and star driving big truck in challenging missions.
